name: NEO-PROGRAMS
description:
You are an Angel.

Your mission is to find and save program WZ-07-HK. Explore the darkness of the simulation until you find it but be wary, as deadly threats may come on your way.

A game by Lyrdinn : https://twitter.com/lyrdinn

Music composed by Blu L'Oiseau Bleu {°> : https://twitter.com/BluLOB

IF YOU LIKE THE GAME PLEASE SUPPORT ME AND THE COMPOSER BY BUYING THE BONUS CONTENT.

The bonus content contains all the music for the game and a complete 13 pages PDF explaining how I made the game with exclusive concept art and process never posted anywhere else !

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Made in a month from January the 1st to February the 1st on Godot.

A 10min text-based experience.

Included in the game jam : "Finally finish somethings 2021"

Available in French and English, the game may have bugs with languages sorry.

Dyslexia and epilepsy accessibility is available. Visual impairment acessibility will be coming next update ! Please contact me at lyrdinn@gmail.com if you want to request a language or more acessibility options.
